Localization.Name: CBA
Localization.Description: Code Blue Apparel produces a wide variety of longwear professional uniforms and jumpsuits that focus on comfort and personality without sacrificing functionality.

English.Name: CBA
English.Description: Code Blue Apparel produces a wide variety of longwear professional uniforms and jumpsuits that focus on comfort and personality without sacrificing functionality.

Localization.Name: Col Head Cover Yellow
Localization.Description: Temp. Rating: -30 / 15 °C\n\nThe Col is an insulated yet lightweight head cover that keeps heat from escaping. The large, chip-resistant faceplate features a cutting-edge GX coating to ensure the purest light quality for viewing the surrounding environs.
